item.title: [JS/Problem Solving] Getting the highest possible number
item.description: Task Requirements A number between 0 and 1,000,000 and k that is smaller than the first number is given. When k amount of digit is removed, return the highest possible number. My Attemps for Solution No.1) Using Combination On first thought, I wasn’t aware of how big the number could be, and came up with the idea to find all possiblities and to compare these to find the maximum value.
